0.heading: 4-day BBD Bursar Week
items:
Built software to calculate the shortest path between major cities.The route was displayed on a map via the Google Maps Platform and the Google Vision API was used to track a ball that was
programmed to move to cones which representied the cities

I used the Arduino Platform to set up proximity sensors to detect when the ball is
close to the cone

1.heading: 4-day BBD Bursar Week
items: Created a real-time scheduling web application connected to Outlook

2.heading: 4-day BBD Bursar Week
items: Created a website to vote for presenters at a BBD presentation event
Best project out of 4 bursar groups
Stack used: Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP (LAMP)
